definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Well cook dumplings with seafood for you.
sentences.chinese: 我们煮海鲜水饺给你吃。

sentences.english: And did you know that there are really zillions of ways to prepare a great seafood meal?
sentences.chinese: 你知道吗，准备一顿美好的海鲜大餐有无数种方法？

sentences.english: Wen was eating japanese seafood at the crisis area.
sentences.chinese: 温家宝在吃日本辐射区海鲜。

sentences.english: Make sure that fish or other seafood are wrapped and use as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 切记鱼或其他海鲜要包装好，并且尽快食用。

sentences.english: Las Rocas Bar and Grill is the best spot for fresh seafood specialties.
sentences.chinese: 拉斯罗卡斯酒吧和烧烤是新鲜的海鲜特产的最佳位置。

sentences.english: One Day Batam City Shopping Tour with One Seafood Lunch as per itinerary.
sentences.chinese: 一天的巴淡岛购物游和一个海鲜中餐。

sentences.english: Shrimp, fish, scallops, seafood-tomato broth, parmesan cheese.
sentences.chinese: 大虾，鱼，干贝，海鲜茄汁高汤，帕玛森芝士。

sentences.english: Olive oil is basic to paella.
sentences.chinese: 橄榄油是海鲜饭的基本佐料。

sentences.english: And now, seafood laced with potentially unhealthy levels of antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 如今还有抗生素水平可能不健康的海鲜。

sentences.english: Clam chowders have --- as the name suggests --- clams and fish stock.
sentences.chinese: 蛤蜊海鲜杂烩里面还有蛤蜊和鱼类高汤。

sentences.english: This generous wine feels softer when paired with the Sautéed Rice with Seafood and Thailand Shrimp Paste.
sentences.chinese: 这慷慨的酒和泰式虾膏海鲜炒饭搭配时显得温柔一些。

sentences.english: There is a very strong emphasis on fish and shellfish.
sentences.chinese: 同时非常强调鱼和贝壳类海鲜。

sentences.english: Seafood also contains iodine, which is good for your thyroids.
sentences.chinese: 食用海鲜还可以补充对甲状腺有益的碘元素。

sentences.english: Best food match stew, BBQ fish.
Yesterday, Iate a lot of seafoods in hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我在香港吃了很多海鲜。
